title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: We are glad to announce our new line of offshore streaming dedicated servers in Bulgaria, these are special offshore streaming servers, where you can have 100% freedom of content and fully duplex dedicated uplinks ranging from 1gbps upto 20gbps and with unmetered bandwidth, many networks have some restrictions on the packets and specific type of traffic due to security and network overusage abuse reasons, however these servers come with no restrictions and a true dedicated uplinks.You can view the line of offshore streaming servers here: https://www.zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpYou can also customize these for a custom quote kindly contact with sales.BTC and XMR are also accepted.
